actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1348.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 7308, a bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to authorize applications for a court order approving the use of electronic surveillance to obtain foreign intelligence information.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7308 (Foreign intelligence surveillance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 7308, a bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to authorize applications for a court order approving the use of electronic surveillance to obtain foreign intelligence information.
